thread.title: Vietjet to give away 500,000 tickets on all routes
thread.title_full: Vietjet to give away 500,000 tickets on all routes

title: Vietjet to give away 500,000 tickets on all routes
text:
Home » travel » Vietjet to give away 500,000 tickets on all routes Airline Offer Vietjet to give away 500,000 tickets on all routes July 24, 2015 1:00 pm 
Passengers at check-in counter for Vietjet's flight at Tan Son Nhat International Airport Vietjet celebrates its new routes by giving away 500,000 tickets on all routes To celebrate launching its new routes from HCMC and Hanoi to Pleiku (Vietnam's famous highland city); and HCMC to Seoul (South Korea), Vietjet is giving away more than 500,000 tickets from just Bt 0 in a special week-long promotion called "Enjoy your summer - It's time to Vietjet". The promotion, which runs from now to July 29 is applicable for all of Vietjet's domestic flights and international routes. The airline currently flies from Vietnam to cities in Thailand, Singapore, Taiwan and South Korea. The promotion fares are excluding taxes, fees and charges; terms and conditions are also applied. The travel period for the promotion is from September 7 to December 31 with the exception of the new route to Pleiku which debuts on October 1. Promotional tickets can be booked at www.vietjetair.com (also compatible with smartphones at www.m.vietjetair.com ) or at www.facebook.com/vietjetvietnam (by clicking the "Booking" tab) or at Vietjet's ticketing offices and agencies worldwide. 214 Viewed
